original_title: Joshua and the Promised Land: Reanimated
overview: Faced with a tough home life, Joshua Carter and his guardian angel, Christopher Andrew Eugene Bozioni, adventure into the heart of the Old Testament. Reliving the life of the real Joshua - crossing the Red Sea to enter the Promised Land. This remake of the 2004 film was completed in 15 months and features the work of nearly 400 animators.
tagline: This December, join us for a retelling of one of the greatest stories of ALL TIME
title: Joshua and the Promised Land: Reanimated
